pros: Staff motivation, Training, good remuneration, promotion, Team work.
cons: No accommodation,feeding staff transportation, lack of break room and poor health insurance

review_title: Medical officer with > 8years postgraduation and active practice
pros: Working with this highly rated Orthopaedic centre give an opportunity to work  with best of hands in the speciality and it's thus encouraging enough.
cons: There may not be enough opportunities for the younger doctors to improve on their skills, though this can be by encouraging younger doctors to going into residency training

pros: In Lennox Hospital, they tend to take good care of their staff
cons: Physical environment is not well in order
